descr: "Indicates how the medication is/was taken or should be taken by the patient."

fields.name: sequence
fields.descr: "Indicates the order in which the dosage instructions should be applied or interpreted."

fields.name: text
fields.descr: "Free text dosage instructions e.g. SIG."

fields.name: additionalInstruction
fields.descr: "Supplemental instruction - e.g. \"with meals\"."

fields.name: patientInstruction
fields.descr: "Instructions in terms that are understood by the patient or consumer."

fields.name: timing
fields.descr: "When medication should be administered."

fields.name: asNeededBoolean
fields.descr: "Indicates whether the Medication is only taken when needed within a specific dosing schedule (Boolean option), or it indicates the precondition for taking the Medication (CodeableConcept)."

fields.name: asNeededCodeableConcept
fields.descr: "Indicates whether the Medication is only taken when needed within a specific dosing schedule (Boolean option), or it indicates the precondition for taking the Medication (CodeableConcept)."

fields.name: site
fields.descr: "Body site to administer to."

fields.name: route
fields.descr: "How drug should enter body."

fields.name: method
fields.descr: "Technique for administering medication."

fields.name: doseRange
fields.descr: "Amount of medication per dose."

fields.name: doseSimpleQuantity
fields.descr: "Amount of medication per dose."

fields.name: maxDosePerPeriod
fields.descr: "Upper limit on medication per unit of time."

fields.name: maxDosePerAdministration
fields.descr: "Upper limit on medication per administration."

fields.name: maxDosePerLifetime
fields.descr: "Upper limit on medication per lifetime of the patient."

fields.name: rateRatio
fields.descr: "Amount of medication per unit of time."

fields.name: rateRange
fields.descr: "Amount of medication per unit of time."

fields.name: rateSimpleQuantity
fields.descr: "Amount of medication per unit of time."

fields.name: id
fields.descr:
"unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces."
 derived from Element

fields.name: extension
fields.descr:
"May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the element. In order to make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance  applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer is allowed to define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension."
 derived from Element
